title: The Besties Podcast 34
description:
After a night of heavy drinking, some of The Besties aren't quite up to fighting form. And yet, they press on! In this episode, Assassin's Creed 3 makes its second appearance, and we give some props to some unhappy birds. There's also some mention of a horrifying juice cleanse. Oh yeah, and Halo 4.

05:20 - Assassin's Creed 3
21:00 - Knights of Pen & Paper
29:35 - Halftime: Polygon launch party
33:30 - Angry Birds Star Wars
39:30 - Halo 4
49:00 - THE DECISION

Theme song by Ian Dorsch
Get the show:

Download MP3"
Subscribe to the podcast (RSS)
Subscribe on iTunes
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
